subject: Re: [junit] Re: Need to test a method that returns void
msgSnippet: ... I imagine there s a way to detect whether compress() actually compressed something. If so, make that assertion in your try { ... } body. Take care. -- J.
messageBody:
kotuv wrote:

> public void testCompressWithFileName(){
>
> boolean result = true;
> try{
> DataCompressionUtility.compress(smallFile);
> }catch(Exception ex){
> result = false;
> }
> Assert.assertTrue(result);
> }

I imagine there's a way to detect whether compress() actually compressed
something. If so, make that assertion in your try { ... } body.

Take care.
--
